instructions:
Boil the pasta
Bring a pot of salted water to a boil. Add spaghetti and cook according to package instructions (usually 8–10 minutes), until al dente. Drain and set aside.

Make the garlic butter sauce
In a large pan, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and cook for about 1–2 minutes, until fragrant (don’t let it burn!). Add a splash of olive oil if desired.

Toss the pasta
Add the drained spaghetti to the pan. Toss well to coat the pasta in the garlic butter. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

Serve
Plate the pasta and top with chopped parsley and grated Parmesan if using.
